column4: heh how about sharing some of that money, or atleast knowledge on how to get iptables tarpit to work with 606.. i really dread having to rebuild my kernel
knowing my luck i'll get popcorn
i think i remember seeing an iptables/tarpit walkthrough for Ubuntu somewhere. i've never used it, personally, so i'd have to do a leetle reserach.
yeah i saw somthing for breezy but nuttin on dapper, tryin to find the walkthrough isn't as easy as one would hope.
